item.title: Why I don't answer questions about my ethnicity as 'South Asian'
item.author: Author
item.description: Good morning, fellow reader, lurker and lover of information. To the wild reader who, yet again has stumbled upon this corner of the internet I call the recess of my thoughts, I say welcome. Note There's more history to this than what meets the eye. If you want to know more, please do message me and I would be happy to share all the resources I can with you. If you've got your own flavour of identity, let's chat!
